title: Zara Sales Analysis
description: Predictive machine learning model that forecasts item profitability based on features like seasonality, promotional status, and in-store placement.

title: Image-Based Textile Composition Classifier
description: ResNet-50-based Convolutional Neural Network which classifies fabric compositions from high-resolution clothing images.

title: Canvas Recreation
description: A recreation of Canvas for teachers.

title: Crochet Pattern Generation Interface
description: This web app allows users to create crochet or knit patterns and designs. You can pick how many rows and columns are needed for your project, then you can color in this grid however you please to create fun designs.

title: Love Detector
description: Are you a TRUE match? Come and find out!
